title: Template-Based Instructional Software Development Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and experience with Learning Management Systems (LMS)
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate managers/leaders responsible for mathematics education, emphasizing the development of instructional software capabilities by strengthening competency in template-based authoring tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design and develop a prototype for mathematics education software using template-based authoring tools
Learners can implement interactive learning modules applying instructional design principles with over 80% completeness

Learners can evaluate educational effectiveness (learning objective achievement, content organization, interaction design, etc.) of development outputs against at least three criteria through peer assessment

resources: Sample Dataset for Mathematics Educational Content

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
